languages.text: {n}Закрыв глаза и шумно принюхавшись, Волк угрюмо рычит:{/n} "То, что убило этих смертных, еще рядом. Я чую запах... неживой запах. Не как от трупа, а словно от железных зубьев в пасти Моркаи".

{n}Closing his eyes and sniffing noisily, the Wolf snarls grimly,{/n} "What killed these mortals is still near. I can smell it... A lifeless stench. Not like a corpse, but like the iron teeth in Morkai's maw."
languages.original_text: {n}Закрыв глаза и шумно принюхавшись, Волк угрюмо рычит:{/n} "То, что убило этих смертных, еще рядом. Я чую запах... неживой запах. Не как от трупа, а словно от железных зубьев в пасти Моркаи".

traits.locale_text: {n}Closing his eyes and sniffing noisily, the Wolf snarls grimly,{/n} "What killed these mortals is still near. I can smell it... A lifeless stench. Not like a corpse, but like the iron teeth in Morkai's maw."

{n}Closing his eyes and sniffing noisily, the Wolf snarls grimly,{/n} "What killed these mortals is still near. I can smell it... A lifeless stench. Not like a corpse, but like the iron teeth in Morkai's maw."

{n}Closing his eyes and sniffing noisily, the Wolf snarls grimly,{/n} "What killed these mortals is still near. I can smell it... A lifeless stench. Not like a corpse, but like the iron teeth in Morkai's maw."

{n}Closing his eyes and sniffing noisily, the Wolf snarls grimly,{/n} "What killed these mortals is still near. I can smell it... A lifeless stench. Not like a corpse, but like the iron teeth in Morkai's maw."

languages.text: {n}鼻をならしながら臭いを嗅いで目をつむると、狼は険しい顔つきでうなる。{/n}「この人間たちを殺した奴は、まだ近くにいる。臭いで分かる…生気のない悪臭だ。死体とは違う。モルカイのマウの鉄歯のようだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Closing his eyes and sniffing noisily, the Wolf snarls grimly,{/n} "What killed these mortals is still near. I can smell it... A lifeless stench. Not like a corpse, but like the iron teeth in Morkai's maw."

traits.locale_text: {n}鼻をならしながら臭いを嗅いで目をつむると、狼は険しい顔つきでうなる。{/n}「この人間たちを殺した奴は、まだ近くにいる。臭いで分かる…生気のない悪臭だ。死体とは違う。モルカイのマウの鉄歯のようだ」

languages.text: {n}乌尔法闭上眼睛，用力地嗅着，随后发出了冷冷的低吼。{/n}“杀害这些凡人的东西还在附近。我能嗅到……某种毫无生机的气味。不是尸体的气味，更像是莫凯嘴里的钢牙。”
languages.original_text: {n}Closing his eyes and sniffing noisily, the Wolf snarls grimly,{/n} "What killed these mortals is still near. I can smell it... A lifeless stench. Not like a corpse, but like the iron teeth in Morkai's maw."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法闭上眼睛，用力地嗅着，随后发出了冷冷的低吼。{/n}“杀害这些凡人的东西还在附近。我能嗅到……某种毫无生机的气味。不是尸体的气味，更像是莫凯嘴里的钢牙。”

languages.text: {n}Le Loup ferme les yeux et renifle bruyamment avant de gronder :{/n} « Ce qui a tué ces mortels n'est pas loin. Je le sens... Une puanteur sans vie. Pas comme un cadavre, mais comme les crocs d'acier des mâchoires de Morkaï. »
languages.original_text: {n}Closing his eyes and sniffing noisily, the Wolf snarls grimly,{/n} "What killed these mortals is still near. I can smell it... A lifeless stench. Not like a corpse, but like the iron teeth in Morkai's maw."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Loup ferme les yeux et renifle bruyamment avant de gronder :{/n} « Ce qui a tué ces mortels n'est pas loin. Je le sens... Une puanteur sans vie. Pas comme un cadavre, mais comme les crocs d'acier des mâchoires de Morkaï. »

languages.text: {n}El Lobo, tras cerrar los ojos y emitir un ruidoso olfateo, gruñe malhumorado:{/n} «Lo que mató a estos mortales sigue cerca. Puedo olerlo... Un hedor sin vida. No como el de un cadáver, sino como el de la dentadura de hierro que tiene Morkai».
languages.original_text: {n}Closing his eyes and sniffing noisily, the Wolf snarls grimly,{/n} "What killed these mortals is still near. I can smell it... A lifeless stench. Not like a corpse, but like the iron teeth in Morkai's maw."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Lobo, tras cerrar los ojos y emitir un ruidoso olfateo, gruñe malhumorado:{/n} «Lo que mató a estos mortales sigue cerca. Puedo olerlo... Un hedor sin vida. No como el de un cadáver, sino como el de la dentadura de hierro que tiene Morkai».

languages.text: {n}Mit geschlossenen Augen und geräuschvoll schnüffelnd knurrt der Wolf grimmig: {/n} "Was diese Sterblichen getötet hat, ist noch in der Nähe. Ich kann es riechen ... Ein lebloser Gestank. Allerdings nicht von einem Toten. Er gleicht eher den eisernen Zähnen in Morkais Maul."
languages.original_text: {n}Closing his eyes and sniffing noisily, the Wolf snarls grimly,{/n} "What killed these mortals is still near. I can smell it... A lifeless stench. Not like a corpse, but like the iron teeth in Morkai's maw."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit geschlossenen Augen und geräuschvoll schnüffelnd knurrt der Wolf grimmig: {/n} "Was diese Sterblichen getötet hat, ist noch in der Nähe. Ich kann es riechen ... Ein lebloser Gestank. Allerdings nicht von einem Toten. Er gleicht eher den eisernen Zähnen in Morkais Maul."

languages.text: {n}Kurt; gözlerini kapatıyor, yüksek sesle havayı kokluyor ve canı sıkkın bir şekilde homurdanıyor.{/n} "Bu ölümlüleri öldüren her ne ise yakınlarda. Kokusunu alabiliyorum. Yaşam barındırmayan bir koku. Ceset gibi değil, daha çok Morkai'ın ağzındaki demir diş gibi."
languages.original_text: {n}Closing his eyes and sniffing noisily, the Wolf snarls grimly,{/n} "What killed these mortals is still near. I can smell it... A lifeless stench. Not like a corpse, but like the iron teeth in Morkai's maw."
